comments:
Driver: TPTP-4.0-200502172312

To reproduce: 
Check out the manual test suties from dev.eclipse.org\home\tptp\test-results and
try launch a test suites, see progress bar shows the launch of the test suites
and got an error dialog on a NPE.

Following is captured from .log file:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.hyades.test.core 4 0 2005-02-18 11:37:38.711
!MESSAGE IWAT4039E The Test Execution Harness reported the following problems:
java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.TestExecutionHarness.launchTest(Unknown
Source)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.TestExecutionHarness.launchTest(Unknown
Source)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.launch.delegates.BasicTestLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.invokeTestExecutionHarness(Unknown
Source)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.launch.delegates.AbstractLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.launch(Unknown
Source)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:588)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:513)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch(DebugUIPlugin.java:738)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin$6.run(DebugUIPlugin.java:910)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)

This may be a known issue, as the Test Project is still working on getting all
features fully functional after the 4.0 migration.  Scott, can you please use
this defect to track the status of that work?

Thanks

Raising this to P1 as it's stopping user from running test suites in TPTP4.0,
which is one of the main features on TPTP.
*** Bug 85300 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Manual tests are now functional in 4.0 -- there were numerous fixes that led 
up to fixing this defect overall:

o  Extension point names were changed and the execution harness and other 
related code was not yet modified to reflect the name changes
o  JAR names need to be changed to use periods instead of hyphens between name 
fragments; the agent controller pluginconfig.xml files referred to the names 
with periods (as in 3.3) and this was causing classes not to be found
o  Manual test launch configuration invoke test harness method signature 
changed to accept progress monitor (was calling into the basic launch delegate 
instead and the resource was not being set properly on the test implementor 
and therefore the test suite was not called out as needed by the manual test 
runner

JUnits and URL tests are not verified to function yet in the 4.0 product.

I verify the fix is in TPTP 4.0 and it works fine on Windows XP; However, I got
java.exe application error when rerun the scenario on Windows2K.

Will attach shot of error dialog.

Created an attachment (id=24926)
screen shot of application error message

there is no entry created in .log file for further analysis.

the JVM configured in Agent Controller is

java.exe -version
java version "1.4.2"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.4.2)
Classic VM (build 1.4.2, J2RE 1.4.2 IBM Windows 32 build cndev-20040511 (JIT
enabled: jitc))

java.exe -Xj9 -version
java version "1.4.2"
J9 - VM for the Java(TM) platform (build 2.1)
IBM J9SE VM (build 2.1, J2RE 1.4.2 IBM J9 build 20040422 (JIT enabled))

problem can be reproduce on Terry and my W2k machine, but not on Alex's w2k
machine. I am trying to get the JVM Alex's using.

I was using TPTP-4.0.0-200507141319 and Alex was using
tptp.runtime-TPTP-4.0.0-20050705. 

Waiting for dll patch from Scott to verify it's related to another stop ship bug
addressed after 0714 driver.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 103601 ***

patch from Scott(and Samson) fixed the problem. 
I will attach the patch files here.
also verified patch fix on WindowsXP SP1 machine
*** Bug 85300 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
